channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Behold the Lamb Presents
channel.desc: Order is all around us. However, the enemy likes for us to believe that chaos is also a part of normal life. He uses chaos to bring about his changes and to insnare his victims. Our prayer is that you will be blessed with this message entitled, Finding Order Out of Chaos. Paul in 1 Corinthians 14:40, admonished the people to, Let all things be done decently and in order. Remember, the Bible was written by men who were inspired by the Holy Spirit as they wrote.
